references.paper_title: Communication-efficient learning of deep networks from decentralized data
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of federated learning, introducing the FedAvg algorithm which is a basis for many subsequent FL methods.

references.paper_title: UMAP: Uniform Manifold Approximation and Projection for Dimension Reduction
references.reason: UMAP is a highly influential dimensionality reduction technique, and this paper provides the foundation for the contrastive neighbor embedding approach used in FEDNE.
t-SNE is a widely used dimensionality reduction technique, and this paper is fundamental to the understanding and application of neighbor embedding methods.

references.paper_title: Contrastive learning unifies t-SNE and UMAP
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation connecting neighbor embedding methods with contrastive loss, which is crucial to the development of FEDNE.
This paper offers a theoretical analysis of the attraction-repulsion forces in neighbor embedding methods, which is directly relevant to the design of the FEDNE loss function.
